abstract: All the fashion news of the week that's fit to reprint.
snippet: All the fashion news of the week that's fit to reprint.
lead_paragraph: Alba, JessicaSues the weight-loss garment, Belly Bandit, for listing her under the "Celebrity Testimonials" section of its Web site. Heck, I'd be upset, too, if I'd dieted for months after giving birth and a silly slimming gimmick got all of the credit.

headline.main: Chic in Review | Burberry Rules the World Wide Web
